column4: jjasonClark Unix and Linux System Administration Handbook by Evi Nemeth, Gatrh Snyder etc is a really solid generic admin book which should work
It also covers Ubuntu specificaly and is a big pile of dead trees if you opt for the version
have you read this book? Did it work for you? The cover looks interesting
done. buying it now.  Thanks a bunch. I really need something that I can read offline and mark up with notes.
